content:
Trying to go through Mathematics In Lean, but it's been stuck like this, updating for a while. I tried clicking Restart File because some red text that is now gone told me to. That lead to Source Control having a blue dot keep popping up, though that isn't happening since the last time I restarted Visual Studio Code.
image.png
I think I had done that. I tried doing it again, and it seemed to successfully do that, but it's still updating.
It's working now! I uninstalled/deleted everything and started over and the same thing popped up, but resolved itself this time when I clicked Restart File.
tris has marked this topic as resolved.
